groups.name: All Church Events
groups.description: This is the default group for all church events that are not department specific.Â

leaders.name: Andrew Coffield
leaders.bio:
River of Life is an Apostolic Pentecostal church located in Henry, Illinois. We are a community of believers passionate about sharing the love of Jesus Christ and helping people discover their purpose in Him.

My wife Chelsea and I feel honored and blessed to serve as pastors of this incredible church family. We moved here in 2023 with a vision to build a church where everyone feels welcome, loved, and valued.

At River of Life, we believe that church should be a place where life begins - where you can find hope, healing, and a fresh start no matter where you've been or what you've been through.

Whether you're exploring faith for the first time, returning after time away, or looking for a new church home, we'd love to meet you. Our doors are always open, and there's a place here for you.

We invite you to join us for a service and experience the warmth and love of our church family. We truly believe that your best days are ahead!

groups.name: Hyphen
groups.description: age 18 to 30, as long as you are single and never married!

leaders.name: Jennifer Hawk
leaders.bio: Nov 2025 IL State Teacher of the month!

leaders.name: Scott Jensen
leaders.bio: Scott is on the board of River of Life and is in rotation to teach Christian Education on Sundays. His wife Cris is a Sunday School teacher in the nursery class.

groups.name: Youth
groups.description: The Youth group is all about students age 12-18! We meet Wednesday nights from 7:15-8PM for Bible Study and then once a month (normally the first Friday) to hangout and have fun!
